author: sourceforge-iceant
msg: After generated stub and tie, JavaToIdl will exit to system,This version will not exit when it finished this operation.
So,Deploy tool in openorb can compile the stub and tie source .

author: dblevins
msg: Applied Stafan's patch for the race condition in the StatelessInstanceManager

author: dblevins
msg: In the process of moving all our shell scripts to a bin directory.
In there place there will be a single openejb.bat and openejb.sh
This will serve as the point of entry for the project and software.

author: dblevins
msg: Regenerated the Stubs and Ties using OpenORB 1.2.1 and the additional -local flag
Added new ties and stubs for the RMiIiopHome and RMiIiopObject.
